passages.text:
Hi!
This is the story about how my child went to college.
It began when... 
Come on sport.
You gotta stand up from your computer to start your college journey there sport!
*You Stand Up*
Well there ya go!
Now the way they got to college was by walkin out of that darn room and showin the world what their made of.
Go on sport!
[[Leave->Street]]
(link:"Close Door")[=
But at first they didn't want to leave their little room.
We'll im sorry sport but that's not an option
you can be an internet celebrity and sell your bathwater
*after* you've gone to college
passages.name: Start

passages.text:
Ahh. There we go!
Smell the fresh air, do you feel that breeze?
This is the part of the story where my child *chose* to go to college!
[[Go To College ->College]]
[[Don't Go To College ->Not College]]
passages.name: Street

passages.text:
Ahaha! Fantastic choice!
There were many exciting challenges that my child faced at college!
The first of which was what major to pick?

Now of course, my child chose Business Entreprenuership
You've always been extremely industrius sport, and that's what I've always loved about you.

*You see two doors ahead of you*
*One door has pictures of money on it*
*The other has a paint brush*

[[Choose Money Door->College Money]]
[[Choose Paint Brush Door->College Art]]
passages.name: College

passages.text:
Woah! Hold on there!
You're going the wrong way!
Let me help you out!
*Teleports you back to the street*
[[Go Back To The Street->Street2]]
passages.name: Not College

passages.text:
Whew, you almost went the wrong way there sport!
Now to help you out with my story I've made a sign for you!
*A sign is now here*

''Go
2
College''

Ok, now make your decision.
[[Go To College ->College]]
[[Don't Go To College ->Not College2]]
[[Enter Grungy Building -> Grungy Building]]
passages.name: Street2

passages.text:
Ok, allright sport.
Listen.. I know you probably hate school right now.
We all did, certainly your mom and I did when we finished highschool.
But let me ask you this?
If you decide you want to go back to college later
Are you gonna remember all that complex math you learned in highschool?
Here let me show you something
*teleports you back to the street*
[[Back to the street->Street3]]
passages.name: Not College2

passages.text:
*You are now back at the street, but now there is a chalk board with *
''2 + 2 = ?''
Ok sport! This here is an easy one! But as you answer, ask yourself. Will I remember how to do this a year, two years, even a decade from now?

*You can also see the directions that indicate college and not college have signs with answers on them that have been created fairly hastily*
[[4 / College -> Releif]]
[[32 / Not College ->Not College 3]]
passages.name: Street3

passages.text:
GHASP!
It's happening quicker than I thought!
You've only been out of highschool for a day and you've already forgotten how to do 2 plus 2!
Well. I hope you see now why it's so important that you go to college as quickly as possible!
At this rate you might forget how to read by next week!
*Teleports you back to the street*
[[Go Back To The Street->Street4]]
passages.name: Not College 3

passages.text:
*You are back at the street again, but now you see a sign that has gibberish written on it*
Actually to be honest, I'm a little worried about that whole reading thing.
Tell me what does this sign say?
[[Optometrist->College Job]]
[[Cashier->Not College 4]]
passages.name: Street4

passages.text:
Haha! Well, that's a relief.
Do you know where you have to go to become an ... optometrist?
Well.. you're a smart kid, i'll let you figure that one out on your own.
Let me show you something else
*Teleports you somewhere else*
[[Teleport Somewhere Else->Shmisneyland]]
passages.name: College Job

passages.text:
Well, sport this is more troubling to me than I thought.
It seems like the decision is making itself!
Now, just turn around and lets make get that degree!

[[Turn Around->College]] 
[[Continue->NotCollegeBoss]]
passages.name: Not College 4

passages.text:
NOOOOO!!
This is not how the story is supposed to go!
*A demon drops down from the sky onto the street destroying some buildings*
YOU WILL GO TO COLLEGE FOR YOUR OWN GOOD!
*Boss fight ensues*

[[Defeat Dad-Demon->NotCollegeEnding]]
passages.name: NotCollegeBoss

passages.text:
*The boss is now defeated and shrinks down to the size of a normal sheep*
*It is clearly the sheeps father*

Listen sport,
I've cared and protected you for your whole life.
I've worked hard to give you the best possible start to your life as possible.
And you've done great! You worked hard! You always tried your best.
But I guess the majority of my job is done.
It's your life now.
All I ask is that you reach out if you need any help.
And let your dear old dad know how you're doing.
After all I'm still your dad.
Go get-em tiger.
passages.name: NotCollegeEnding

passages.text:
*You are at the entrance of shmisneyland*
Welcome to shmisneyland!
You love shmisneyland!
Go ahead! Explore! My treat!

(link:"Go See Jimmy Jerboa!")[
*You go to see Jimmy Jerboa He is so small he is barely a spec on the screen*
Wow, look sport! It's Jimmy Jerboa!
You love Jimmy Jerboa! 
Doesn't he look just like you imagined?
And sport I can garuntee you that whatever actor they shoved inside that tiny costume ... probably didn't go to college.
]
(link:"Go To Balloon Stand")[
Oh you look so happy with those balloons. Just like you did when you were a kid.
If you get your degree at school you can afford as many balloons as you want!
]
(link:"Go Get Some Food")[
Oh yeah. The food at shmisneyland is great! I particularly love the giant carrot stand with the big ear of corn.
*You get a carrot that is in the shape of a turkey leg*
]

(link:"Leave Shmisneyland")[
*You try to leave shmisneyland, but the door disappears and re-appears somewhere else*
Actually you know what! I've had so much fun with you here at shmisneyland remembering the good times.
Lets stay just a little bit longer!
(link:"Leave Shmisneyland")[
*The door moves again*
Yeah! Lets stay a little longer! Just like when you were a kid! You never wanted to leave!
*You turn into a child again*
Haha yes! It's perfect! Wooh! I'm having so much fun!
(link:"Leave Shmisneyland")[
*Now as you walk towards the door it moves away from you*
Oooh yeah! I can't even remember what we were doing before we came here. Something about college?
You're far too young to go to college we still have a few years to tackle that issue.
I'm sure you'll make me proud!
For now lets just have fun
*Game restarts*
]
]
]
passages.name: Shmisneyland

passages.text:
*You enter the grungy building*
*After you enter the building the door slams behind you*
*You hear the narrators voice coming from outside, but it's muffled*
No, wait... come back, don't go in there.
*The narrator continues talking, but its too muffled to hear*

[[Continue ->Fight Club Hallway]]
passages.name: Grungy Building

passages.text:
*You are in an empty hallway*
[[Continue-> Fight Club]]
passages.name: Fight Club Hallway

passages.text:
*You see a slightly tougher looking group of sheep*
*You are standing in the middle of a circle drawn on the ground*
Ahahaha! Look at that we got new mutton.
And they're in the ring.
*You see a door that has an exit sighn on it opposite from where the tough looking sheep are*
 
 (link:"Try To Escape")[*You walk toward the outside of the circle, but are stopped by other sheep that come in through the door*]
 
 UH UH UHHH You can't leave the circle. This is the fight circle.
 The first rule of Fight Circle is that you can only leave by fighting someone in the circle.
 
 [[Fight the sheep -> Post Fight Ending]]
passages.name: Fight Club

passages.text:
*You swiftly punch and knock out all the sheep in the room*
*After you do the police swarm the room and surround the area*
Holy cow! You took out all of these guys all on your own!
We just found out about these guys.
It wasn't too hard to find considering all they did was talk about their fight ring.
passages.name: Post Fight Ending

passages.text:
Whew! That's a huge relief.
Oh and look at that! You ended up in the school major room.
Well... you might as well pick one just to see where it leads you.

[[Business ->College Money]]
[[Art ->College Art]]
passages.name: Releif

passages.text:
And they chose the business degree.
Just like histories most famous people.
People like sheeplon musk, and schmeff bezos!
Actually schmeff bezos didn't even major in business.
That gave my child a large headstart on him.
My Child went to the classroom and worked diligently in their classes.

[[Go to Class -> Business Class]]
passages.name: College Money

passages.text:
Ahh the art major.
That's not exactly how my story was meant to go down, but ok!
As long as you have some interesting jobs in mind after you finish.
.. and well... it is college so that's worth celebrating!
I didn't even know you could draw.
Would you mind drawing something for me?
(set: $toCourt to false)
[[Yes -> Draw]]
[[No -> Not Draw]]
passages.name: College Art

passages.text:
They Joined their dad's old frat and made plenty of business contacts


[[Leave Classroom to go to frat part -> Frat Party]]

links.name: Leave Classroom to go to frat part

passages.name: Business Class

passages.text:
*You see a bunch of sheep laying around clearly drunk and unconcious*
Then one night while talking with some frat guys they come up with an idea for a world changing app.

[[Talk with group of sheep ->App]]
passages.name: Frat Party

passages.text:
They work hard to develop their app, which is eventually purchased by a large tech company for over 200 Million dollars!

[[Sell App -> Space]]
passages.name: App

passages.text:
After the app was sold they had enough money to fulfill their shared dream with their father to launch into space and visit the ISS!

[[Fly spaceship to ISS -> ISS ENding]]
passages.name: Space

passages.text:
All the while thinking back to that fateful day they finally decided to leave their room and take on the rest of their life!

FIN
passages.name: ISS ENding

passages.text:
*A canvas shows up in front of you, and a sign that says draw me my favorite thing!*

(input-box:"=XX=","Type Drawing Here")

[[Submit Drawing -> Post Drawing]]
passages.name: Draw

passages.text:
Oh.. well..
Ok I guess it's a little embarrasing to show your personal expression to your father.
The one who raised you.
The one who bathed you.
The one who gave up his dream of becoming the next big television judge in order to see your successful passage into adulthood.
But it's fine.
"The Final Shearing"
That's what it would have been called.
(set: $toCourt to true)
[[ Continue -> The Final Shearing]]
passages.name: Not Draw

passages.text:
(if:$toCourt is false)[
Haha! Wow, I'm impressed! 
Not really by the art that could use some work.
But how did you know that was my favorite thing?
Your mother must have told you.
Well at least my money won't be going to waste, because I think those lessons will help you a lot.
]
(if:$toCourt is true)[
Well, It certainly isn't the Mona Lisa, but it will do.
I appreciate you drawing this for me.
Consider your sentance served.
and at least i know my money won't be going to waste
You have a lot of learning to do
]

[[ Go To Art School ->ArtSchool]]
passages.name: Post Drawing

passages.text:
*A Theme song plays*
*Announcer voice*
ON TODAY'S EPISODE OF
THE FINAL SHEARING
ARE YOU A BAD CHILD?
LETS FIND OUT.
THE HONORABLE JUDGE JEBADIAH WOOLY PRESIDING

Hello everyone. Court is now in session.
Will the defendent please raise their right hoof?

[[ Raise Hoof -> Raise Hoof]]
passages.name: The Final Shearing

passages.text:
Now according to this report I have before me
It says that you are a son/daughter is this correct

[[Yes -> Law Yes Response]]
[[No -> Law No Response]]
passages.name: Raise Hoof

passages.text:
Hmm, ok very good.
It looks like you are the child of....
Me...
Hmm very interesting. I can't say that this is precedented, but It's my court so I'll allow it.

[[Continue -> Law Response Resolution ]]
passages.name: Law Yes Response

passages.text:
Hmmm,
Well according to this report it says you are
I'm going to take that as a joke, but let me remind you
You are in a court of law, and will be held in contempt of court for misbehaviour

[[ Continue -> Law Response Resolution ]]
passages.name: Law No Response

passages.text:
So I see here you ... the defendent ... are being chared with the crime of
being a bad child
Defense how do you plead?

[[Guilty -> Guilty]]
[[Not Guilty -> Not Guilty]]
passages.name: Law Response Resolution

passages.text:
Well I believe we have our verdict then

[[ Continue -> Verdict]]
passages.name: Guilty

passages.text:
Inconsequential
I am your father and I deem you guilty!

[[Continue -> Verdict]]
passages.name: Not Guilty

passages.text:
By the state of Woolsconsin I deem you guilty of being a bad child.

Your punishment will be to paint me one painting.
Case dismissed.

[[Paint Painting -> Draw]]
passages.name: Verdict

passages.text:
Long story short,
Yeah they went to art school.
Yeah they did a great job and now they are back living with me.
Yeah of course I'm proud of them!
I hear they may have their first job as a mural painter soon!
I just hope they are happy.
passages.name: ArtSchool
